CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Contact__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK( Secondary_Property_Owner__c )), TEXT(Contact__r.Salutation) & ' ' & Contact__r.LastName & ' & ' & TEXT( Secondary_Property_Owner__r.Salutation ) & ' ' & Secondary_Property_Owner__r.LastName, IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Contact__c )) && ISBLANK( Secondary_Property_Owner__c ), TEXT(Contact__r.Salutation) & ' ' & Contact__r.LastName , IF( ISBLANK( Contact__c ) && NOT(ISBLANK( Secondary_Property_Owner__c )) , TEXT(Secondary_Property_Owner__r.Salutation) & ' ' & Secondary_Property_Owner__r.LastName, NULL ) ) )
CustomField.label: Household Last Name
